snippet: A video showing workers at a pig farm hitting animals with cans and boards prompted the firings of seven employees, but the authorities said Wednesday no criminal charges would be filed.
lead_paragraph: A video showing workers at a pig farm hitting animals with cans and boards prompted the firings of seven employees, but the authorities said Wednesday no criminal charges would be filed.

headline.main: Colorado: Pig Handlers Fired for Abuse
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Pig Handlers Fired For Abuse
